title: Nenjankoottil Lyrics Dishyum
stanzas:
#Nenjankoottil Song Lyrics From #Dishyum
#VijayAntony #Vairamuthu

hey nenjaankoottil
neeyae nirkiraai penne
nettri pottil
theeyai vaikkiraai

katti poattu kaathal
seigiraai muthugil
katterumbu poalae oorgiraai

kaathal dhaane..
ithu kaathal dhaane
unnai ninaippathai
niruthi vittaal,
nenju yenadi thudikkavillai

ennam yaavaiyum
azhithu vittaen,
innum poga marakkavillai..

nenjaankoottil
neeyae nirkiraai penne
nettri pottil
theeyai vaikkiraai

vinnai thudaikindra mugilai..
velli nilavai..
manjal natchathirathai..
ennai thedi mannil
varavazhaithu
unnai kaathalippathai
uraithaen..

indru pirakkindra poovukkum..
siru pullukkum..
kaathal uraithu mudithaen
ullam kaathalikkum
unakku mattum,
innum sollavillayae
illayae…

latcham pala latcham
ingu thaai mozhiyil
sollirukka
oththa chollu sikkavillai
yethanaalae..

panthi vacha veetukaari
paathiratha kazhuvittu
pattiniyaa kalaippaalae
athu polae..

hey nenjaankoottil
neeyae nirkiraai penne
nettri pottil
theeyai vaikkiraai

chinna chinna
chella kurumbum,
cheeni chiruppum,
yennai seerazhikkuthae..

viru viruvena valarum
pazham enthan
virathangalai velluthae..

unnai karam patri izhuthu
valai udaithu,
kaathal sollida solluthae…

vetkam iru pakkam
meesai mulaithu
yennai kuthi kuthiyae
kolluthae…

kaathal yendra
neethi vazhi,
kaiya veesi vantha pinnum
kal thadukka
kaathirukku yethanaalae?

february maathathukku
naalu onnu koodivara
aandu naalu kaathirukkum
athu polae…
nenjaankoottil..

nenjaankoottil
neeyae nirkiraai penne
nettri pottil
theeyai vaikkiraai

katti poattu kaathal
seigiraai muthugil
katterumbu poalae oorgiraai

kaathal dhaane..
ithu kaathal dhaane
unnai ninaippathai
niruthi vittaal,
nenju yenadi thudikkavillai

ennam yaavaiyum
azhithu vittaen,
innum poga marakkavillai..

seo.title: Nenjankoottil Lyrics Dishyum
seo.description: Get the complete Nenjankoottil Lyrics Dishyum from Dishyum. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by Vijay Antony and sung by Jayadev. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Dishyum, Vijay Antony, Jayadev, Rajalakshmi, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
